data.name: Astral, Chat, delayed dice menu
data.description: Modifies: Delayed dice menus in the in-game chat. Shrinks the long formula into a "click" button, enables Actions to be menus of die rolls by skill or attribute

user.name: xBladeRunner
user.about: I play Savage Worlds on Roll20 and (maybe soon) AstralTableTop. I love to fix things, so if you have a problem with one of my styles or a suggestion, let me know.

data.name: Astral, Chat, color unicode dice
data.description: Modifies: bold and italic die rolls in chat. The unicode dice characters are too small, this makes them larger and colors them.

data.name: Roll20, Status Icons, show a subset
data.description: Modifies: Status Icons popup for tokens. This hides the icons we don't use, making it faster to find and select the ones we need. All icons listed, so you can modify it to suit your own game.

data.name: Roll20, Turn Order Settings, sort by card
data.description: Modifies: Turn Order Settings dialog. This hides all sort options except sort by card. Useful for Savage Worlds.

user.name: xBladeRunner
user.about: I play Savage Worlds on Roll20 and (maybe soon) AstralTableTop. I love to fix things, so if you have a problem with one of my styles or a suggestion, let me know.

data.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://app.roll20.net/editor/") {
/* 
    Roll20, Turn Order Settings, sort by card
    Modifies: Turn Order Settings dialog
    This hides all sort options except sort by card.
    Useful for Savage Worlds.
*/

div#initiativewindow_settings { background-color: ivory; }
div#initiativewindow_settings p:nth-child(1) { display: block; } /* sort options */
div#initiativewindow_settings p:nth-child(2) { display: none; }  /* numerically */
div#initiativewindow_settings p:nth-child(3) { display: none; }  /* alphabetically */
div#initiativewindow_settings p:nth-child(4) { display: block; } /* card suit */
div#initiativewindow_settings p:nth-child(6) { display: none; }  /* custom item */
div#initiativewindow_settings hr { display: none; } /* nth-child 5 and 7 */

}

RedFlagDeals Focus Mode
Weather.com Dark Mode
data.description: weather.com / The Weather Channel dark theme for Stylus.

data.name: Roll20 Marketplace Read Tags and See Pictures
data.description: This one came about as I was looking for a tavern map. The set I was looking at had whole city blocks where tavern was in the tag, but not the title. Unfortunately the tags only display 1 line, so doing a Cmd/Ctrl-F to find which items had a tavern on them wasn't helping—if the tag doesn't display, I can't tell where it is highlighted. Also, the titles obscure the bottom half of the preview image, so I couldn't always quickly see what I was looking for. This style causes all tags to display, and starts the title just below the preview image, so nothing is obscured. This does have the effect of making the page taller, so that fewer items display in the window at once, but give and take.
